name: @soundws/audio-tools-lambda-layer
description: Static build of FFmpeg/FFprobe, Sox & Lame for Amazon Linux 2, packaged as a Lambda layer.
author: The First Coders Team (https://www.firstcoders.co.uk)

scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p dist/aws-sam && cp -R .aws-sam/build dist/aws-sam
scripts.sam:publish: npm run build && sam package --template-file .aws-sam/build/template.yaml --output-template-file packaged.yaml --s3-bucket $AWS_SAM_PACKAGE_BUCKET_NAME --region $AWS_REGION && sam publish --template packaged.yaml --region $AWS_REGION --semantic-version $npm_package_version
